definitions: To successfully make contact with someone, usually by phone.
To successfully complete or finish something difficult.
To manage to survive a difficult period.
To use up or finish a supply of something.
examples: I tried to call her all morning, but I couldn't get through.
It took me hours to get through all the paperwork.
We'll get through this tough time together.
I just can't get through to him; he doesn't listen.
We got through a whole loaf of bread in one day.
